item.title: Pictures from Nordic Perl Workshop
item.description: Larry in sunset by Marcus Ramberg Last week, we arranged Nordic Perl Workshop in Oslo. I've uploaded some pictures from the conference and the hackathon that was arranged at LinPro the weekend after. I've tagged all my photos with npw2009.
